description: An app truly for the high class men and women that need a search assistant, your very own Farnsworth Butler, to take care of all their search needs. Simply type in what you are looking for in the search bar and tap Farnsworth's arm as he starts your search as you watch. This app is not only an assistant, but a status symbol that screams opulence and sophistication. If you cannot afford this app, DO NOT BUY IT! It is only for the truly affluent that can appreciate it.
